title: Login page not working
description: Users are unable to log in with correct credentials.

title: Profile picture not uploading
description: Error appears when uploading profile images.

title: Email notifications delayed
description: System emails are being sent after 1-2 hours delay.

title: Search results incorrect
description: Some products are missing from search results.

title: Mobile app crashes
description: App crashes when opening user profile page.

title: Order history not visible
description: Users report blank order history after recent update.

title: Slow dashboard loading
description: Admin dashboard takes too long to load.

title: Incorrect tax calculation
description: Tax amounts displayed incorrectly on invoices.

title: Push notifications not received
description: Some Android users are not receiving push alerts.

title: Broken links on homepage
description: Several links on the homepage return 404 errors.

title: Password reset email not sent
description: Password reset requests are not triggering emails.
